body_html: @aaroey Thanks for the comments. I have updated the PR. There is no need to setup any specific build environment for building nGraph on Ubuntu 16.04 and macOS. Just selecting nGraph build option during the configure step will suffice to built TensorFlow with nGraph. Please let us know if you have additional questions or comments.

body: @aaroey Thanks for the comments. I have updated the PR. There is no need to setup any specific build environment for building nGraph on Ubuntu 16.04 and macOS. Just selecting nGraph build option during the configure step will suffice to built TensorFlow with nGraph. Please let us know if you have additional questions or comments.
